title: 88/43/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 December 1987 on the forward estimate for live plants for 1988
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 22 December 1987
on the forward estimate for live plants for 1988
(88/43/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The forward estimate, as referred to in Article 251 (1) of the Act of Accession, for live plants subject to the supplementary trade mechanism (STM) and imported into Portugal during, the period 1 January to 31 December 1988 is set forth in the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
